name: IngloriousDISCO
description:
Since I'm confined to my home I took the opportunity to make this LudumDare 46 Solo which is first for me ^^. Having a more GameDesign oriented profile, and a level below zero in 2D, I've launched into a full 2D game x) (logic humm... nop).
So I present you "IngloriousDisco" as you can imagine and on the theme of disco. You'll help "Francky" to keep pace on the music, while other dancers, jealous of his performance, wil try to disturb him. And so, you'll need your keyboard and to warm up your fingers , be careful, it's going to swing!!! There's a little Tuto in Game with images to help understanding the game's progress, which is not very complicated. Enough chatting, it's up to you, let's play !!! 
Kiss From France :p
